4542BC85.Line11.128F75: If we did not do everything we could to save you, how could we call ourselves followers of the Light?

916E48C5.Line5.FEF63: And thank you Petr, Kvera. I know it wasn't easy for faithful folk to do what you did for me.

A6792CD6.Line15.FEF63: My friend, give me just a moment and I will meet you outside. You deserve a proper thanks.

C5573BEB.Line9.FEF74: Sister, you saved my boy. There was no choice to make.

F6AF58A3.VoiceDir15.FEF63: Still a tad weak from sickness.
